title: Enterprise Endpoint Security Market Growing Steadily Worldwide
text:
The report titled Enterprise Endpoint Security Market - Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size, segmentation by region, deployment model, end-user, solution type and industry vertical. This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
The report brings about a detailed description of the developed regions (like North America) and emerging markets (like Asia) globally, service provider analysis (ResearchFox LAYERS), market forces, metrics and market share for the Enterprise Endpoint Security Software market.
“Growing Internet Penetration and Increased BYOD Implementation driving the growth”
Enterprise Endpoint Security solutions are essentially those software solutions which secure every endpoint devices used in the organizations from potential threats like network intrusions, viruses, malware and similar other. Increase in web based applications and improving telecom connectivity has enabled companies to implement programs like BYOD throughout their operations. As the organizations are expanding their operations worldwide, the need for usage of multiple endpoint devices has grown. Ever increasing employee headcount and growing number of multiple devices used by these employees have prompted many of the organizations to tread carefully when it comes to managing their digital corporate assets. Hence, the demand for enterprise endpoint security solutions is set to grow further in the coming years.
Security experts believe that presence of solutions like enterprise endpoint security would help the data driven company to a larger extent. In the current scenario where employees are forced to travel due to business compulsions, the use of multiple endpoint devices becomes essentially unavoidable. Moreover, employees also expect that their company should provide them seamless access to the corporate data through various devices. Hence comes the concept of BYOD which eventually increases the ease of doing business transactions on-the-go but at the cost of increased security threats. At times, cyber-miscreants get easy access to corporate network via the endpoint device and by the time the employer/employee realizes the blunder, a data disaster has already taken place. Incidents of the similar kind has taken place in the past and companies can only reduce such costly losses by embracing advanced enterprise endpoint security solutions.
Large Enterprises are the biggest consumers and North America contributes the most to the revenue.
Average endpoint device per person is one of the highest in North American countries like the USA and Canada. Moreover, the number of cyber-attacks in this region is also highest in the world. All these factors have contributed to the growth of enterprise endpoint security solutions. Added to this, the enterprise level businesses have emerged as the most users of these solutions. This is because that many of the enterprise businesses have numerous employees who use multiple devices. Hence, safeguarding the corporate data from any kind of attacks would be of prime importance. Thus, the adoption.
On-Premise Deployment contributes the most with greater adoption among financial services and Security Suites are the most preferred solution.
Deployment wise, traditional on-premise version holds the greater market share compared to cloud. But, the trend is slowly changing and the cloud and other deployment models are eating the market pie for the on-premise versions. Among the industry verticals, financial businesses are emerging as the greatest consumers due to increase in usage of endpoint devices by their large number of employees. Also, security suites have emerged as the most preferred solution and holds the highest market share. The demand for one comprehensive solution that can contain several security threats and protect multiple devices has increased the demand for security suite products.
